entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
